summary: This bill proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 100 North Taylor Lane in Patagonia, Arizona, as the "Jim Kolbe Memorial Post Office." The bill specifies the new name and states that all references to the facility in any legal or official document will be updated accordingly. It was introduced in the House of Representatives on June 26, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
